main event: An oblong object flying at very high altitude and speed was observed near Neustadt, Germany on 29 June 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as whitish-gray and shaped like an oval or disc., The sighting lasted for a short period of time., Several German witnesses reported the sighting., The observation was documented in a Project Blue Book record., This sighting appears to be part of routine investigations by the U.S. Air Force.
